<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Issue reporting form">f0d65e652f0111105ca8d2172799b664</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4d2a4b292fc111105ca8d2172799b634</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Prueba</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var problems = g_form.getValue('problem');
		g_form.clearOptions('problem');
    if(newValue == 'yes'){
     alert('Yes i do know');}
	if(newValue == 'no'){
		
      alert('No i do not');
      
}  if(isLoading && !g_form.isNewRecord()){
      g_form.setValue('issue_type', problems);
    }}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-03 17:54:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>11acf15a2f8111105ca8d2172799b6ad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Prueba</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Printer" source="x_857394_printer">41b65e612f0111105ca8d2172799b6aa</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Printer">41b65e612f0111105ca8d2172799b6aa</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_11acf15a2f8111105ca8d2172799b6ad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-03 18:12:36</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
